resources.string: GeoRiders is the final project for COMP3330 - Interactive Mobile Application Design and Programming
The aim of the player is to fly the furthest by avoiding obstacles
This game utilizes gyroscope and a database
\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t Manual is the easier mode. \n If you are up to a challenge - choose Tilting.
Original design and code by Michal J Sekulski
